actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5 damage) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10 damage) lightning damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales lightning in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10 damage) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
